document.full_text: apple inc plans to build a circular "spaceship" building in hometown cupertino that will hold 12,000 employees -- and be the best office building in the world, chief executive steve jobs said.
document.title: apple's jobs shows off "spaceship" headquarters plan
lines_and_colors: apple inc plans to build a circular "spaceship" building in hometown cupertino that will hold 12,000 employees -- and be the best office building in the world, chief executive steve jobs said.
